articles.description: Another 1,346 people have tested positive in the North West, bringing the region's total number of cases to 304,875 as of Monday, November 30, 2020.
articles.content:
Nationwide, the latest figures from Public Health England show a total of 1,617,327 lab-confirmed cases across the UK. 
It means another 12,155 people tested positive across the nation on Sunday, No… [+1794 chars]

articles.title: Covid: Researchers fear cancer advances delay due to pandemic - BBC News
articles.description: Scientists fear research has been pushed back due to the pandemic, a survey suggests.
articles.content:
Advances in cancer research could be delayed by nearly 18 months due to the coronavirus pandemic, scientists fear. 
A survey of more than 200 scientists at the Institute of Cancer Research suggested… [+2897 chars]
